comment: Tests that ensure appropriate settings are backed up.

variables.name: BACKUP_BLACKLISTED_SYSTEM_SETTINGS
variables.comment:
* The following blacklists contain settings that should *not* be backed up and restored to
     * another device.  As a general rule, anything that is not user configurable should be
     * blacklisted (and conversely, things that *are* user configurable *should* be backed up)

methods.name: private static void checkSettingsBackedUpOrBlacklisted(Set<String> settings, Set<String> settingsToBackup, Set<String> blacklist)
private static Set<String> getCandidateSettings(Class<? extends Settings.NameValueTable> clazz)
private static Set<T> difference(Set<T> s1, Set<T> s2)
private static Set<T> intersect(Set<T> s1, Set<T> s2)

methodNames: private static void checkSettingsBackedUpOrBlacklisted(Set<String> settings, Set<String> settingsToBackup, Set<String> blacklist)
private static Set<String> getCandidateSettings(Class<? extends Settings.NameValueTable> clazz)
private static Set<T> difference(Set<T> s1, Set<T> s2)
private static Set<T> intersect(Set<T> s1, Set<T> s2)
